data.message: These "like" buttons are annoying! Go back to the other buttons!!

replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, Nicole. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1RohZu8. -Kate
Nicole Miller, I agree with you. I absolutely do NOT "like" the new system. If I wanted to use those, I would put them in there myself.
All they needed too add was a Dislike Button, I find these very annoying.
Wow.....I think it's a GREAT idea....just don't use them if you don't like them....but there are a lot of people that like them.

I love them! It's a great way to acknowledge something without simply hitting "like" or "dislike." It's much quicker than searching through your phone for the right emoji or commenting. (I get you should comment if it's important or you have time, but that is simply not always the case in most people's lives) You have to think also about how teens would use the "dislike" button in a negative way also, which FB kept in mind, I'm sure.

These people complaining about Facebook moving forward and progressing if you don't like it delete your accounts. Facebook is not forcing you to go or visit their site. It's your own decision. Usually when people don't like something they do not continue to ingage in what they don't like so it baffles me why you are still on here using Facebook and complaining.
Nicole my comment, after yours, has disappeared. Hmm. Facebook didn't "like" it?
